summary: An elderly woman hires a governess with a mysterious past to look after her disturbed and spoiled teenage granddaughter, who eventually understands the meaning of self-sacrifice, as an example of love, and grows into a better person.
cast: Deborah Kerr|Hayley Mills|John Mills|Edith Evans|Felix Aylmer|Elizabeth Sellars|Lally Bowers|Toke Townley|Tonie MacMillan
title: Mujer sin pasado
